targets.query: SELECT last("elapsed") FROM "process_start_time_seconds" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("gauge") * 1000 FROM "process_start_time_seconds" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_percent") FROM "docker_container_mem" WHERE ("container_name" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "process_resident_memory_bytes" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_percent") / 100 FROM "docker_container_cpu" WHERE ("container_name" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT last("n_cpus") FROM "docker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("gauge")  FROM "go_doudou_gomaxprocs" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT max("gauge") FROM "go_goroutines" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "go_threads" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "process_open_fds" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "process_max_fds" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("counter"), 1s) FROM "go_doudou_http_request_count" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

panels.description: average response time per Interval time

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("sum")) / non_negative_derivative(last("count")) FROM "go_doudou_http_response_time_seconds" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(${Interval}), "method", "path" fill(null)

panels.title: Avg Response Time

targets.query: SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "go_memstats_next_gc_bytes" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

panels.description: average GC pause time per Interval time

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("sum")) / non_negative_derivative(last("count")) FROM "go_gc_duration_seconds" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Avg GC Pause

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(last("count")) FROM "go_gc_duration_seconds" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("0") FROM "go_gc_duration_seconds" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("0.25") FROM "go_gc_duration_seconds" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("0.5") FROM "go_gc_duration_seconds" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("0.75") FROM "go_gc_duration_seconds" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("1") FROM "go_gc_duration_seconds" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "go_memstats_heap_objects" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Heap Objects (total number of allocated objects)

targets.query: SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: HeapSys (bytes of heap memory obtained from the OS)
targets.query: SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "go_memstats_heap_sys_bytes" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "go_memstats_heap_idle_bytes" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: HeapReleased (bytes of physical memory returned to the OS)
targets.query: SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "go_memstats_heap_released_bytes" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("counter") FROM "go_memstats_mallocs_total" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("counter") FROM "go_memstats_frees_total" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("counter") FROM "go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: StackSys (bytes of stack memory obtained from OS)
targets.query: SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "go_memstats_stack_sys_bytes" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "go_memstats_mspan_inuse_bytes" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: MSpanSys (bytes of memory obtained from the OS for mspan)
targets.query: SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "go_memstats_mspan_sys_bytes" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "go_memstats_mcache_inuse_bytes" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

targets.alias: MCacheSys (bytes of memory obtained from the OS for mcache structures)
targets.query: SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "go_memstats_mcache_sys_bytes" WHERE ("url" =~ /.*$Service.*/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

list.definition: show tag values from go_doudou_app_info with key =url
list.name: Service
list.query: show tag values from go_doudou_app_info with key =url
